data.system_settings: Android 7.0 (Samsung Galaxy S8+, S8, S7 Edge)
data.expected_result: It should insert the url or the shared content into the message box.
data.short_description: Problem with sharing without a running instance of application
data.steps_to_repro: - Close the app. (From recents too) - Try to share an url or something. - Notice the url hasn't benn placed - Try again, without closing the app from the recents. - Notice now works
